infos.name: Room A
infos.desc:
You are in a Room A. A typical kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You can make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] Golden locker close by.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The Golden locker contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The Golden locker is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: Room B
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a Room B. An ordinary one.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a Blue locker.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The Blue locker contains [a list of things in the c_1]. You wonder idly who left that here.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The Blue locker is empty![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: Room D
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a Room D. An usual one.

 You make out a Yellow locker.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The Yellow locker contains [a list of things in the c_3]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The Yellow locker is empty![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: Room C
infos.desc:
You arrive in a Room C. An usual one.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a Red locker.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The Red locker contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The Red locker is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: Room E
infos.desc:
You are in a Room E. An usual one.

 You can see a Grey locker.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The Grey locker contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The Grey locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: Golden locker
infos.desc: The Golden locker looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: Blue locker
infos.desc: The Blue locker looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: Red locker
infos.desc: The Red locker looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: Yellow locker
infos.desc: The Yellow locker looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: Grey locker
infos.desc: The Grey locker looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: Task note
infos.desc: Your task is to get a treasure. Treasure is hidden in the golden locker. You need a golden key to unlock it. The key is hidden in one of the other lockers located in the environment. All lockers are locked and require a specific key to unlock. The key 1 you found in room A unlocks grey locker. Other notes you will find will guide you further.

infos.name: Golden key
infos.desc: The metal of the Golden key is rusty.

infos.name: treasure
infos.desc: The treasure seems well matched to everything else here
